42 #include "Teuchos_Dependency.hpp"

45 namespace Teuchos{
46 
47 
48 Dependency::Dependency(
49 ConstParameterEntryList dependees,
50 ParameterEntryList dependents):
51  dependees_(dependees), dependents_(dependents)
52 {
53  checkDependeesAndDependents();
54  createConstDependents();
55 }
56 
57 Dependency::Dependency(
58  ConstParameterEntryList dependees,
59  RCP<ParameterEntry> dependent):
60  dependees_(dependees),
61  dependents_(ParameterEntryList(&dependent, &dependent+1))
62 {
63  checkDependeesAndDependents();
64  createConstDependents();
65 }
66 
67 
68 Dependency::Dependency(
69  RCP<const ParameterEntry> dependee,
70  ParameterEntryList dependents):
71  dependees_(ConstParameterEntryList(&dependee, &dependee+1)),
72  dependents_(dependents)
73 {
74  checkDependeesAndDependents();
75  createConstDependents();
76 }
77 
78 Dependency::Dependency(
79  RCP<const ParameterEntry> dependee,
80  RCP<ParameterEntry> dependent):
81  dependees_(ConstParameterEntryList(&dependee, &dependee+1)),
82  dependents_(ParameterEntryList(&dependent, &dependent+1))
83 {
84  checkDependeesAndDependents();
85  createConstDependents();
86 }
87 
88 
89 void Dependency::createConstDependents(){
90  for(
91  ParameterEntryList::iterator it = dependents_.begin();
92  it != dependents_.end();
93  ++it)
94  {
95  constDependents_.insert(it->getConst());
96  }
97 }
98 
99 void Dependency::print(std::ostream& out) const{
100  out << "Type: " << getTypeAttributeValue() << std::endl;
101  out << "Number of dependees: " << dependees_.size() << std::endl;
102  out << "Number of dependents: " << dependents_.size() << std::endl;
103 
104 }
105 
106 void Dependency::checkDependeesAndDependents(){
107  ConstParameterEntryList::iterator it1 = dependees_.begin();
108  for(; it1 != dependees_.end(); ++it1){
109  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION((*it1).is_null(),
110  InvalidDependencyException,
111  "Cannot have a null dependee!" << std::endl << std::endl);
112  }
113 
114  ParameterEntryList::iterator it2 = dependents_.begin();
115  for(; it2 != dependents_.end(); ++it2){
116  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION((*it2).is_null(),
117  InvalidDependencyException,
118  "Cannot have a null dependent!" << std::endl << std::endl);
119  }
120 }
121 
122 } //namespace Teuchos

Teuchos
The Teuchos namespace contains all of the classes, structs and enums used by Teuchos, as well as a number of utility routines.

Smart reference counting pointer class for automatic garbage collection.
